SELECT * FROM T3_USER LEFT JOIN T3_PROF ON T3_USER.ID = T3_PROF.ID LEFT JOIN T3_CMRE ON T3_USER.ID = T3_CMRE.ID LEFT JOIN T3_JJIM ON T3_USER.ID = T3_JJIM.ID
where T3_USER.ID = #{id}
SELECT CNO, U2.NICK, CONTE FROM T3_USER U INNER JOIN T3_TBRD T ON U.ID = T.ID LEFT JOIN T3_CMRE C ON T.TBNO = C.TBNO LEFT JOIN T3_USER U2 ON C.ID = U2.ID WHERE U.ID = #{id}
SELECT C.CBNO, U.ID, CTITLE, CCONT, HITS, C.CDATE, PATH FROM T3_USER U INNER JOIN T3_CBRD C ON U.ID = C.ID LEFT JOIN T3_CIMG I ON C.CBNO = I.CBNO WHERE U.ID = #{id}
SELECT JJNO, J.ID, J.TBNO, BPRICE, BTITLE, BCONT FROM T3_JJIM J INNER JOIN T3_TBRD T ON J.TBNO = T.TBNO WHERE J.id = #{id}
SELECT T.TBNO, U.ID, BPRICE, BTITLE, BCONT, PATH FROM T3_USER U INNER JOIN T3_TBRD T ON U.ID = T.ID LEFT JOIN T3_TIMG I ON T.TBNO = I.TBNO where U.ID = #{id}
